channel.title: How do i make npc's shout forever
channel.description:
Ok so i make a ::zone command its for staff. I added banks, added custom shops but now i want to add 2 npc's that shout above their head (not in chat) and idk how to... if you know and your viewing this post can you please write me the steps to making them Shout (Forever)
Thanks--Say bye100--
